pkgmetadata.longdescription: Elastic Analysis of Sparse, Dense and Irregular Curves // Provides functions to align curves and to compute mean curves based on the elastic distance defined in the square-root- velocity framework. For more details on this framework see Srivastava and Klassen (2016, doi:10.1007/978-1-4939-4020-2). For more theoretical details on our methods and algorithms see Steyer et al. (2023, doi:10.1111/biom.13706) and Steyer et al. (2023, arXiv:2305.02075).
